subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker sank an improbable shot in the final seconds as the Spurs  overcame a triple-double from the Heat’s LeBron James in the opener of the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Tony Parker sank an improbable shot in the final seconds as the Spurs  overcame a triple-double from the Heat’s LeBron James in the opener of the N.B.A. finals.
